New Records: Henderson tied and then surpassed Cal Ripken Jr.'s team record for a rookie
Key Match Events: Grayson Rodriguez pitched eight outstanding innings
Gunnar Henderson homered and drove in three runs
Adley Rutschman hit a run-scoring single
Ramón Urías hit an RBI single
Cedric Mullins hit an RBI single
Post-Match Reflections: The Orioles extended their streak to 87 consecutive series of at least two decisions without being swept
They snapped a four-game skid that equaled their season high
The Orioles secured a potentially crucial tiebreaker in the AL East with an 8-0 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays
The Orioles moved a game ahead of second-place Tampa Bay and clinched the season series against the Rays
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tampa Bay’s streak of four or fewer earned runs allowed in 11 consecutive games also ended
